approvalStatus.externalId.description: Select an approval status for this time entry.
approvalStatus.externalId.name: approvalStatus.externalId

approvalStatus.internalId.description: Select an approval status for this time entry.
approvalStatus.internalId.name: approvalStatus.internalId

approvalStatus.name.description: Select an approval status for this time entry.
approvalStatus.name.name: approvalStatus.name

billingClass.description: Select a billing class for this time entry. If a billing class is selected for this employee it is automatically selected.
billingClass.name: billingClass

caseTaskEvent.externalId.description: Set this field to a case, task or event associated with the employee. You must first perform a search on the employee to get a list of associated cases, tasks, or events.
caseTaskEvent.externalId.name: caseTaskEvent.externalId

caseTaskEvent.internalId.description: Set this field to a case, task or event associated with the employee. You must first perform a search on the employee to get a list of associated cases, tasks, or events.
caseTaskEvent.internalId.name: caseTaskEvent.internalId

caseTaskEvent.name.description: Set this field to a case, task or event associated with the employee. You must first perform a search on the employee to get a list of associated cases, tasks, or events.
caseTaskEvent.name.name: caseTaskEvent.name

customer.externalId.description: References an existing customer. If you select a customer or job, you must also select a service item.
customer.externalId.name: customer.externalId

customer.internalId.description: References an existing customer. If you select a customer or job, you must also select a service item.
customer.internalId.name: customer.internalId

customer.name.description: References an existing customer. If you select a customer or job, you must also select a service item.
customer.name.name: customer.name

department.externalId.description: References a value from a user defined list at Setup > Company > Departments. This field is required when Make Departments Mandatory is enabled at Setup > Accounting > Accounting Preferences.
department.externalId.name: department.externalId

department.internalId.description: References a value from a user defined list at Setup > Company > Departments. This field is required when Make Departments Mandatory is enabled at Setup > Accounting > Accounting Preferences.
department.internalId.name: department.internalId

department.name.description: References a value from a user defined list at Setup > Company > Departments. This field is required when Make Departments Mandatory is enabled at Setup > Accounting > Accounting Preferences.
department.name.name: department.name

isBillable.description: If set to TRUE, the time entered can be billed.
isBillable.name: isBillable

item.externalId.description: References an existing service item record. This field is required when the customer field is set.
item.externalId.name: item.externalId

item.internalId.description: References an existing service item record. This field is required when the customer field is set.
item.internalId.name: item.internalId

item.name.description: References an existing service item record. This field is required when the customer field is set.
item.name.name: item.name

location.externalId.description: References a value in a user-defined list at Setup > Company > Classifications > Locations. This field is required when Make Locations Mandatory is enabled at Setup > Accounting > Accounting Preferences.
location.externalId.name: location.externalId

location.internalId.description: References a value in a user-defined list at Setup > Company > Classifications > Locations. This field is required when Make Locations Mandatory is enabled at Setup > Accounting > Accounting Preferences.
location.internalId.name: location.internalId

location.name.description: References a value in a user-defined list at Setup > Company > Classifications > Locations. This field is required when Make Locations Mandatory is enabled at Setup > Accounting > Accounting Preferences.
location.name.name: location.name

memo.description: If you want, enter a memo for this time transaction.If you are billing this time back to a customer or job, this memo appears as a description for this line item on the customer invoice.
memo.name: memo

overrideRate.description: If you're billing this time back to a customer, check this box to lock the rate you enter so it's not affected by rate changes that happen before the customer is billed.If you're entering time for a charge-based project and there are time-based charge rules, the rate is determined by the applied charge rule. Any rates entered on time records are discarded.If you are entering time for a payroll item like vacation time, leave this field blank.
overrideRate.name: overrideRate

paidExternally.description: Set to TRUE to designate that this time will be or has been paid to the employee outside of NetSuite.This removes the time entry from NetSuite payroll lists and transactions but still keeps the time available for billing back to the customer.
paidExternally.name: paidExternally

price.externalId.description: If you've set up a custom price level for your customer, it appears here. Otherwise, Sales Price 1 on the service item's record appears.If you want to change the price level, select one from the list. Select Custom to enter a new price in the Rate field.If you're entering time for a payroll item like vacation time, leave this field blank.If you're entering time for a charge-based project and there are time-based charge rules, any price level selected in this field will be overridden by the applied charge rule.
price.externalId.name: price.externalId

price.internalId.description: If you've set up a custom price level for your customer, it appears here. Otherwise, Sales Price 1 on the service item's record appears.If you want to change the price level, select one from the list. Select Custom to enter a new price in the Rate field.If you're entering time for a payroll item like vacation time, leave this field blank.If you're entering time for a charge-based project and there are time-based charge rules, any price level selected in this field will be overridden by the applied charge rule.
price.internalId.name: price.internalId

price.name.description: If you've set up a custom price level for your customer, it appears here. Otherwise, Sales Price 1 on the service item's record appears.If you want to change the price level, select one from the list. Select Custom to enter a new price in the Rate field.If you're entering time for a payroll item like vacation time, leave this field blank.If you're entering time for a charge-based project and there are time-based charge rules, any price level selected in this field will be overridden by the applied charge rule.
price.name.name: price.name

rate.description: If you selected a price in the Price Level field, it automatically appears here.If you don't use multiple prices or if you selected Custom in the Price Level field, enter a rate for this time transaction.If you're entering time for a payroll item like vacation time, leave this field blank.If you're entering time for a charge-based project and there are time-based charge rules, any rate entered in this field will be overridden by the applied charge rule.
rate.name: rate

subsidiary.externalId.description: The subsidiary associated with the employee is displayed here.
subsidiary.externalId.name: subsidiary.externalId

subsidiary.internalId.description: The subsidiary associated with the employee is displayed here.
subsidiary.internalId.name: subsidiary.internalId

subsidiary.name.description: The subsidiary associated with the employee is displayed here.
subsidiary.name.name: subsidiary.name

timeType.value.description: The type of time transaction is displayed here. Actual time is time that has been worked by an employee. Planned time is time that has been accounted for when planning a project. Allocated time is time that has been assigned due to a resource allocation.
timeType.value.name: timeType.value

type.value.description: References an existing customer. If you select a customer or job, you must also select a service item.
type.value.name: type.value
